VideoTitle: Creating Windows Store Apps Using Visual Basic: (04) State Management
Author: JeffKoch

VideoTitle: Creating Windows Store Apps Using Visual Basic: (05) Client Storage Options
Author: JeffKoch

VideoTitle: Creating Windows Store Apps Using Visual Basic: (06) App Bars, Flyouts, and Other UI Considerations
